#Text=Novafeltria
#Text=Novafeltria is in Emilia-Romagna , in Rimini province .
#Text=It is part of the Montefeltro area .
#Text=History
#Text=Until 1941 it was known as Mercatino Marecchia .
#Text=The current Town Hall was the 17th century residence of Counts of Segni from Bologna .
#Text=By plane

#Text=The closest airports are “ Marconi ” airport of Bologna , around 170 km away from Novafeltria ; the " Ridolfi " of Forlì , at 70 km from Novafeltria ; and “ Federico Fellini ” International Airport of Rimini , served with 2 flights daily from London Stansted by Ryanair .
#Text=By train
#Text=The nearest train station is in Rimini .
#Text=From there , there are buses connecting to Novafeltria .
#Text=By car
#Text=Getting there by car is the easiest way .
#Text=From Rimini , follow the strada provinciale 258 R Marecchia ( SP 258 ) .
#Text=From Cesena , follow the Strada europea E45 towards Rome , exit at Sarsina , and follow the signs for Sant'Agata Feltria .
#Text=By car
#Text=For getting outside the center , for instance to Perticara , the easiest way is by car .
#Text=It is important to accept that Italians drive in a very pragmatic way when the traffic is intense .
#Text=Taking turns and letting people go in front of you is rare .
#Text=There is little patience so if the light is green when you go into the intersection and you are too slow they will let you know .
#Text=A green light turning to amber is a reason to accelerate , not brake , in part because the lights usually stay amber for several seconds .
#Text=If you brake immediately when the light changes you are likely to get rear-ended .
#Text=On foot
#Text=The city is small enough to be walked .
#Text=Public transport
#Text=There are buses connecting to Rimini , Pennabilli and Sant'Agata Feltria .
#Text=Museums
#Text=Sulphur .
#Text=Events
#Text=E ...
#Text=State in salute
#Text=.
#Text=Eat
#Text=Ristorante
#Text=Osteria Madama Dore ' Di Pavani Danilo & C. Sas
#Text=, Via Marecchia , ☏ +390541926369 , +39 339 7691072 ( mobile ) , ✉ info@osteria-madamadore.com .
#Text=Euro 25-35 for dinner including wine and bottled water .
#Text=Pizza
#Text=Most pizza restaurants serve it only in the evening .
#Text=Pizza al Taglio is pizza with a thicker crust , cooked in a large pan .
#Text=This is served by the piece , usually to take away , and is a good cheap way to get something to fill you up .
#Text=Point to the one you want , indicate if you want more or less than your server is indicating with the knife .
#Text=It 's sold by weight ( the listed price is usually per 100 g , known as an etto , short for ettogrammo , i.e. hectogramm ) .
#Text=This kind of pizza is eaten with the slices stacked on top of each other like a sandwich .
#Text=Ice cream
#Text=Look for a gelateria .
#Text=You will be asked " Panna ? " when it 's almost made - this is the offer of whipped cream on top .
#Text=If you 've already paid , this is free .

#Text=There are a few signs to keep in mind : " Produzione Propria " ( homemade - our own production ) , " Nostra Produzione " ( our production ) , " Produzione Artigianale " ( production by craftsmen ) .

column1: #Text=If the colors seem dull and almost ugly it is probably natural , the bright colors being just a mix .
#Text=Keep in mind , Italians usually wo n't queue , but if they are in line for gelato , get in line yourself : you may have hit the jackpot .
#Text=Sleep
#Text=Hotel Magda , Via Aurelio Saffi , 55 61015 Novafeltria ( RN ) , ☏ +390541920817 , fax : +390541846604 , ✉ dabiordi@hotmail.com .
#Text=content
#Text=Stay safe
#Text=Novafeltria is a safe place , even for women traveling alone .
#Text=There are no reported cases of thefts or violence on tourists .
#Text=The Montefeltro area has been targeted by burglars , but no pickpockets have been signaled .
#Text=In an emergency , call 112 ( Carabinieri ) , 113 ( Police ) , 118 ( medical first aid ) or 115 ( firemen ) .
#Text=Cope
#Text=Police .
#Text=To report theft you should generally go to the Carabinieri station in Via Aldo Moro , 3 .
#Text=Go next
#Text=From Novafeltria , it is easy to get to the medieval towns of San Leo , Pennabilli and Sant'Agata Feltria .
#Text=The Republic of San Marino in the surrounding area .
#Text=Those who prefer the seaside and an intense night life may want to move on to the Riviera Adriatica .
